Description

An interface description for Zend_Http_Client_Adapter_Stream classes.

This interface decribes Zend_Http_Client_Adapter which supports streaming.


Methods

setOutputStream,

setOutputStream( resource   $stream, ) : n/a

Description

Set output stream

This function sets output stream where the result will be stored.


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$stream resource | Stream to write the output to

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
